title: War and Chess
description: Princess Amethyst must save the country, countless lives on both sides, and her sanity... All that Princess Amethyst wants is to be taken seriously, and not treated like a child. To find this satisfaction she must leave behind a bit of her comfortable lifestyle to fight and kill people and other various mythical creatures. In doing so she learns that the world is bigger than her own little bubble...Can her mind handle this? How many lives will be lost? Will Princess Amethyst find what she's looking for, or something entirely different?
author: Helen M. Pugsley
